pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Django ConnexionThis is a django api for [connexion lib](https://connexion.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html).## Get started### Install With poetry:```shpoetry add git+https://github.com/buserbrasil/django-connexion.git#main```With pip:```shpip install git+https://github.com/buserbrasil/django-connexion.git```### Use```pythonfrom django_connexion import DjangoApidoc_api = DjangoApi("openapi.json") # path to openapi file (json or yaml).# ... any codeurlpatterns = [ path("", doc_api.urls), # ... rest of urls path('admin/', admin.site.urls),]```
